website_summaries.verdict: This kit comes from a long-standing, reputable name in lice treatment.
pros: We like the inclusion of a conditioner to make comb-out easier
Also nice that the kit includes a spray for household items that can't be machine-washed
Contains a treatment shampoo, comb-out spray, comb, and spray
cons: A percentage of users found their "brand" of lice resistant to this treatment

customer_reviews.title: I used this product when i was i child, ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this product when i was i child, and after my daughter came home with lice, i knew that I have to buy it. My recommendation is to keep using the comb for a month along with olive oil, just to make sure that all lice and eggs have been totally removed.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena

customer_reviews.title: Anything that gets rid of lice is good
customer_reviews.text: Wish the spray bottle to clean mattresses and couches was bigger, I went through it with only one couch and one mattress. Shampoo was fine though, no irritation and didn’t have a bad smell. I didn’t feel like the comb out spray really did anything though, and ended up not using it after the first few comb throughs
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for young kids....
customer_reviews.text: The scent is strong and quite unpleasant, it drips and runs all over (none of these go well on a young kid. And in the end it didn't even work (still have live bugs after it sitting in hair for the recommended time) so......my recommendation for anyone needing this for at least the younger kids, go with Fairy Tales.....that brand works and doesn't traumatize young children!
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Momma

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This has already been quite a year with lice. We've had it twice now since Christmas. I wanted a product that included lice removal, spray for bedding, and most importantly, combed through easily. This lice removal is easy to use, and my hair was not incredibly tangled after rinsing the product out. If we do get it again, I will definitely be purchasing RID brand lice removal.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and very effective!!!
customer_reviews.text: We only used once and it was effective. the smell is a little bit strong so be careful of applying on hair, much better with someone can helped. It was easy actually to use and we only use the liquid like shampoo and its was really effective though. Much better leave it absorb in the hair and scalp and rinse well. Read the instruction well.
customer_reviews.author: Jason E.

customer_reviews.title: The Spray's The Thing
customer_reviews.text: The spray was the best item in the kit. It worked against the mites I had. The shampoo was good too. The other products I didn't really need.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Burnham

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Just enough shmpoo for one person though
customer_reviews.text: Complete. Just wish available with a second bottle. Only enough for one
customer_reviews.author: Brett C.

customer_reviews.title: Decent Pack
customer_reviews.text: This Lice treatment pack worked great to kill the lice and eggs! The comb didn't work at all though! I ended up having to pick out the eggs one by one!!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Spear

customer_reviews.title: work
customer_reviews.text: bought it because i dealt with kids at my old job and had to check them for lice some of them had them others didnt and im very catious not to get them so it was just a safety precaution for my hair
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra L.

customer_reviews.title: MY GO TO!
customer_reviews.text: This is the same stuff my mom used on me and I use it on my kids! This is my go to for treatment of lice!
customer_reviews.author: Windy Archer

customer_reviews.title: the shampoo bottle leaked, 1/3 were gone
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived soiled, after opening, found the shampoo bottle leaked, 1/3 were gone when delivered
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs bigger bittle
customer_reviews.text: Wish the bottle was bigger. My girls have thick long hair. And with kids, it’s bound to happen. Just be sure to comb through...
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Russell

customer_reviews.title: Came open
customer_reviews.text: It came open and there was almost no product left in there
customer_reviews.author: SILVIA

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: Disliked completely, did not work at all on my daughter's hair. Had to buy Nix.
customer_reviews.author: ShawWolfeForever

customer_reviews.title: Damaged property soaked with items form the order
customer_reviews.text: The delivery was damaged, though not easily detected because the Amazon shipping box was intact. Upon opening, I noticed that the manufacturer's box and all of the contents were soaked entirely. The bottle of comb thru detangler was completely empty,. Obviously, the culprit
customer_reviews.author: George Jamison

customer_reviews.title: it did the trick
customer_reviews.text: RID has been a lifetime saver from those pesky little bugs since I was a kid. AS with any product sometimes a second application is needed but as always it worked well.
customer_reviews.author: kristy bailey

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived empty!
customer_reviews.text: It arrive with one of the items in the kit completely empty because it opened and spilled all over the rest of the box. I ordered two kits and this happened in BOTH kits. Extremely disappointed. Save your money and order/buy elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine R. Maguire

customer_reviews.title: Boxes were wet
customer_reviews.text: The box was completely damp both the boxes and apparently there’s no return on this so it’s basically trash. I don’t know if it has water or what it is but better safe than sorry won’t be trying it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I will not recommend this product and will never use again
customer_reviews.text: It did not kill the lice. The lice were still moving after 10 min. I will not recommend this product and will never use again.
customer_reviews.author: Jjw

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: Item was spilled and leaked all over box and I was unable to use the product because of this. The liquid spray was not properly sealed which led me to believe it already had been opened.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to purchase, delivered quickly and works as advertised, very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Easy to purchase, delivered quickly and works as advertised, very happy with my purchase

customer_reviews.title: It was damaged and can't be returned
customer_reviews.text: Nothing the box was leaking. I didn't open it. I need A refund.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this is how mine was delivered. Currently awaiting a solution, as I cant send it back.

customer_reviews.title: Would'nt buy again
customer_reviews.text: You have to be very exact with this product. But killed SOME but not all lice. Only use if somebody is able to help you comb out nits

customer_reviews.title: Not happy but ok they worked with me 😞
customer_reviews.text: I got my box open no comb so far it has not work they did refund my money so I did give it 2 stars 😞

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: When I received it the whole box was Saturated wet. Unable to return and wasn’t able to use it

customer_reviews.title: This comb is the best. The plastic combs are terrible
customer_reviews.text: This comb is the best. The plastic combs are terrible. Would definitely recommend this.

customer_reviews.title: Box was ripped, nothing in spray bottle
customer_reviews.text: The box was a mess, there was nothing inside the spray bottle. I want a free kit or the $13 dollars back.

customer_reviews.title: Great product

customer_reviews.title: Worked like it was supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Worked like it was supposed to, loved being able to have the privacy of having it delivered right to the house.

customer_reviews.title: shampoo and comb out spray work great, but the box looked re-used and was open ...
customer_reviews.text: Package received today, shampoo and comb out spray work great, but the box looked re-used and was open at the bottom when I received it, and no comb was in the box. I had to go out and buy a separate comb.

customer_reviews.title: worked!
customer_reviews.text: Worked just as stated. Easy to follow directions and less expensive that buying at drugstore. Bought one to keep on hand.

customer_reviews.title: Upset with my package
customer_reviews.text: I got my stuff today and I opened the box and the comb out spray was gone exploited or something not very happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: for the 911 box of school age kid ailments
customer_reviews.text: Its actually to stock up for the 'what if' emergency box... kid has camp coming up and I really dont trust other children and netiher should you. Don't assume every Jonny and Jane has common sense to not share a brush/hat. This is a pain in the can up there with pinworms. Personal reflection to my own scarred childhood dealing with it.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with the comb in picture, it came with small comb....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product!!! Took away my childs lice instantly. You need to apply twice your child after a week from the last time you did it.

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this useless product
customer_reviews.text: Didn't do anything. Was useless used nix too also useless. Save yourself some trouble and headache ( pun not intended )

customer_reviews.title: Best and easiest way to rid lice
customer_reviews.text: Every parents nightmare is quickly solved with this kit. The spray, shampoo and detangler help the comb rid your house of these pesky vermit.

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff for yucky stuff.......will buy again but for the love of God, I hope I don't have to.
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff for yucky stuff...............will buy again but for the love of God, I hope I don't have to. Elementary school is a breeding ground for lice.......teach your children not to be hugging and rubbing head on others, sharing ball caps, headbands, brushes....
customer_reviews.author: LondonBridges

customer_reviews.title: Box tampered with and shampoo half empty
customer_reviews.text: The package looked like it had been opened from the bottom. The top was taped shut. Half the shampoo leaked out of the bottle. The lid didn't feel like it was screwed on tight. And, I can't return it. At least I can use the lice comb. Maybe I'll have enough for one shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Was delivered before the expected delivery date. I had tried another lice removal product from our local store. It worked somewhat, but after two treatments, my daughter still had lice in her hair. I had purchased the RID kit and did one more treatment and it got rid of the lice completely. The comb that came with this kit was also a LOT better than the ones that came with the other products I had purchased and removed more of the lice that you couldn't see.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Product delivery 👎
customer_reviews.text: I got the product and it was leaking for some reason and treatment number 2 was empty! I tried to return it but for some reason on amazon I couldn’t!!
customer_reviews.author: Zeina

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: When your kids bring home bugs. This kit did the trick. And has enough info in it to keep you from a reoccurance.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Ives

customer_reviews.title: Did the job... We had to buy ...
customer_reviews.text: Did the job... We had to buy the Terminator comb, however. The comb in the kit didn't work that well.

customer_reviews.title: Spilled and waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived open and all of the liquid spilled out. It was a mess. I’m (now) unable to reach amazon to replace. This item is listed as non-refundable!
customer_reviews.author: average buyer

customer_reviews.title: The products works great for shorter hair length. Just need to make it better for long hair I did not have enough for my hair.
customer_reviews.text: Needs to have more. If you have long hair like mine it’s does take more for long hair
customer_reviews.author: dori hodges

customer_reviews.title: The product works wonderfully as long as you treat your whole house
customer_reviews.text: Got rid of the head lice within two treatments. The product works wonderfully as long as you treat your whole house. Treat the heads, wash all sheets and pillows; along with any stuffed animals your child sleeps with. The product won't work if not done correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Ann Delapaz

customer_reviews.title: Comes with everything you need
customer_reviews.text: My 2 daughters got lice at school and I was able to use in on both of them. Works great

customer_reviews.title: Its a lice treatment, what more can I say
customer_reviews.text: Its a lice treatment, what more can I say, it does the job!

customer_reviews.title: Used product. In this case, pretty disgusting surprise
customer_reviews.text: The box was open and the product had been used. The comb was dirty and traces of hair sebum was clearly on it. NICE!

customer_reviews.text: the comb i got with mine was different and the shampoo only seemed to make the bugs move faster and lay more eggs, the spray kills pretty well though.

customer_reviews.title: What in the world?
customer_reviews.text: When I got home to open my package the RID treatment had imploded.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The comb was great and we only shampoo once then comb the eggs out.

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I like the product by RID but beware the pictured comb is not the one you get. Sadly it was just the small medal ones with no handle. Will be returning because to be honest that's the comb I was looking for. I will be buying everything separately to get that type of comb. I do like how with RID you can always call for assistance.

customer_reviews.title: Bugs
customer_reviews.text: Found this kit on website a lot cheaper than in the stores I bought 2 kits cause I don't need any other pets in my house

customer_reviews.title: Great effectiveness
customer_reviews.text: After trying natural products that did not work, I used this on my girls and it got rid of the bugs. yuck.

customer_reviews.title: figured out how lice was contacted? how could I ...
customer_reviews.text: figured out how lice was contacted? how could I have contacted lice when I only get out for Dr's. appts.? I will give you some thinking to do... shrubbery (hedges), tall grasses (ankle and above) deep, wild free birds, bird baths farm animals incl. wild animals and lovely home adopted pets...RID works.children are great carriers. We know this by children being sent home from schools with a note. so, if you cut grass and before you go spreading rumors, and or begin blaming where and from whom you may have contacted parasite...rethink of your last where abouts. RID works wonders. see if I operate equipment and or paint wearing shorts outdoors again. RID gets 5 Stars. by: hotel kalifornia
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommended if you or your child has lice
customer_reviews.text: Definitely recommended if you or your child has lice. Gets rid of the nits quickly. I have long hair and it worked on my hair as well.

customer_reviews.title: I have long hair and just needed to use it once.
customer_reviews.text: Good price and good comb, I have very long hair and it did the job, I am a very clean person but when you have a lot of people around you it is good to have a good care for hair if needed and is safe for children just be patient when combing the hair for best results I started from the bottom on up with the combing and it worked fine but if you have long hair you might need two boxes to make sure to cover all the hair.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Don't even bother.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the Kroger brand I had bought came with a plastic comb that was awful to use in my daughter's long, thick, curly hair. The shampoo didn't kill any of the lice! And the comb was awful. The comb didn't get any of the eggs. I stopped using it after only a few passes through one small section of her hair. It wasn't getting anything. All of the tines are spaced too far apart. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: I tried it and it was excellent. The comb is perfect to get the lice ...
customer_reviews.text: I had struggle with my son having lice. I tried everything until I found this product. I tried it and it was excellent. The comb is perfect to get the lice out. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: RID Lice Treatment Complete Kit, Includes 4 Fluid Ounces RID Lice Killing Shampoo, 2 Fluid Ounces Lice and Egg Comb-Out Spray, Lice Comb, and 3 Ounces RID Home Lice, Bedbug & Dust Mite Home Spray
product_meta.description:
Style:Complete Lice KitIf you're wondering how to get rid of head lice, then the RID Lice Complete Treatment Kit might be right for you. This lice treatment kit features a patented 4-step process: treat with the RID Lice Killing Shampoo, spritz hair with RID Lice & Egg Comb-out Spray, thoroughly comb through hair with the RID Lice Comb to remove lice and lice eggs, and spray affected non-washable items with RID Home Lice, Bed Bug & Dust Mite Spray. RID Home Spray contains powerful permethrin to stop lice from spreading on clothing, mattresses, furniture, car interiors, and other non-washable items. Do not use the RID Home Lice, Bed Bug or Dust Mite Spray on the head or body – not for human use. With RID lice treatment, you can say goodbye to the embarrassing, itchy nuisance of lice and put your best foot forward. RID is recommended for adults and kids over 2.

Covered by the Bayer HealthCare LLC – Consumer Health 60-Day Satisfaction Guarantee. See below for details
feature_bullets: Proven Effective Treatment: For more than 10 years, RID Lice Killing Shampoo has been a proven, effective treatment for removing lice and their eggs
KIT CONTAINS: one (1) 4 ounce bottle RID Lice Killing Shampoo, one (1) 2 ounce bottle RID Lice & Egg Comb Out Spray, one (1) RID lice comb and one (1) 3 ounce can Home Lice, Bed Bug & Dust Mite Spray

SHAMPOO AND COMB OUT: RID Lice Killing Shampoo effectively treats lice while the RID Lice and Egg Comb Out Spray detangles hair to help make combining out lice and lice eggs easier; The included patented RID Lice Comb is specially designed to aid in removing lice eggs
TREAT UNWASHABLE ITEMS: The RID Home Lice, Bedbug & Dust Mite Spray kills lice & their eggs on mattresses, furniture, car interiors and other non washable items

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
